mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of Virginia Black taken in two different years. Pose 1 is from 1924. Poses 2 and 3 are from 1929. Poses 1 and 2 show head and shoulders. Pose 3 is a full figure, showing off an elegant dress. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of Virginia Black (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
